backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing a version update task affecting liveVersion.ts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend Tambola feature files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites and build steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring Tambola game state, voice settings, announcements, and UI layout.
frontend/src/features/tambola/components: Controls for drawing numbers, quick reset, and auto‑draw with cooldown logic.
Scrollable grid showing reverse‑ordered call history with recent number highlighted.
Wraps last‑number display and call history panel into a combined section.
Dialog for recording, previewing, and deleting custom host voice clips for numbers 1‑90.
Card showing the most recent drawn number or game‑complete state.
Button that opens a confirmation dialog and triggers onNewGame when confirmed.
Displays numbers 1–90 in a grid, highlighting those already called.
Provides 15 input fields to verify entered numbers against called numbers and shows success or error feedback.
UI panel to toggle voice announcements, select reading mode, choose voice priority, and open voice manager.
frontend/src/features/tambola/storage.ts: Handles creation, persistence, and validation of Tambola game and auto‑draw settings using localStorage.
frontend/src/features/tambola/types.ts: Defines Tambola game state, auto‑draw settings, persisted state, and game action types.
frontend/src/features/tambola/useTambola: Custom hook managing Tambola gameplay, auto‑draw timers, state persistence, and actions like draw, undo, reset, and new game.
frontend/src/features/tambola/verify/par: Parses comma/space-separated text into unique valid numbers between 1–90.
Parses spoken transcripts into up to 15 valid numbers, handling number words and compounds.
Provides browser TTS helpers: loading voices, selecting English voices, and speaking text with SpeechSynthesis.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/type: Defines voice-related types including reading mode, priority, settings, and playback steps.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useH: Hook to record microphone audio, save it as a clip, and manage recording state and errors.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useS: Hook wrapping the browser SpeechRecognition API to capture transcripts and handle listening state and errors.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useV: Controls number announcements by sequencing TTS and recorded clips based on reading mode and priority.
Manages voice settings state and persistence updates for reading mode, source priority, and enable toggle.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/voic: Helpers for initializing audio context and playing or stopping audio blobs with cleanup.
IndexedDB storage layer for saving, loading, listing, and deleting recorded number voice clips.
Loads and saves voice settings to localStorage with default fallback handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes, colors, and layout defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/release/liveVersion.ts: Defines constants for the currently deployed draft version and its release date.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, themes, animations, fonts, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata, including versioning, feature requests, and the current draft publish status.
